metadata.synopsis: The doctor reacts to the explosion and runs off to call the guards.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Start the Device dialog without the Doctor noticing you, then explode the device.Can potentially trigger almost parallel with Laezel's dialog reacting to the explosion, if present. (CRE_GithInfirmary_AD_LaezelReactionAfterZaithisk)

0.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
0.text: The zaith'isk! Stay right where you are.
